body:
- Project-driven program combining engineering, design, and interactive media.
- Specialized in software engineering and game programming.
- Led and coordinated cross-disciplinary teams of artists, designers, and technical contributors.
- Integrated software, sensors, and UX design, optimizing real-time interaction and reliability under showcase conditions.
- Developed strong technical communication skills through pitching solutions and integrating stakeholder feedback.
- Final-year project featured in the Auckland Art Gallery (Hungry Pixels, digital art installation).
- For the master's program, developed a top-down shooter game featuring a procedural content generation system based on a novel genetic algorithm.
